script-file.#desc: If present, execute the script in script-file and exit.

args.#desc: Additional arguments to the script specified by script-file.

--no-rc: --- Do not load any xonsh RC files.
--no-script-cache: --- Do not cache scripts as they are run.
--cache-everything: --- Use a cache, even for interactive commands.
--timings: --- Prints timing information before the prompt is shown.
